碧.definition: green jade; bluish green; blue; jade

碧土.definition: Putog, former county 1983-1999 in Zogang county 左貢縣|左贡县[Zuo3 gong4 xian4], Chamdo prefecture, Tibet

碧土縣.definition: Putog, former county 1983-1999 in Zogang county 左貢縣|左贡县[Zuo3 gong4 xian4], Chamdo prefecture, Tibet

碧海青天.definition: green sea, blue sky (idiom); sea and sky merge in one shade; loneliness of faithful widow

碧草如茵.definition: green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on

碧螺春.definition: biluochun or pi lo chun, a type of green tea grown in the Dongting Mountain region near Lake Tai 太湖[Tai4 Hu2], Jiangsu

碧血.definition: blood shed in a just cause
